name: Music Maps - Project
description:
This is a prototype that shows the use of music maps. For this I used an already existing scene from an asset pack and divided it into different areas. These areas all play the same tune in a different variation, based on the size of the area, to indicate a sense of importance and scale.

The asset pack in use by Artkovski:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/the-illustrated-nature-15393...
